attributes.action: Visitors entering the UK on a visa must hold valid health insurance
attributes.additional_details:
Examples are well documented in the trade press, in National News programmes on TV highlighted on the BBC2 documentary programme 'Hospital' Episode 4 on 1 February 2017. The Imperial College Healthcare NHS Trust in London was unable to recoup £2.4m during 2015/16 from patients such as these.
No foreign national should be permitted to board a plane or ship to the UK without the port of departure ensuring that they carry adequate health insurance for the full duration of their visit.
attributes.background: Significant numbers of foreign nationals come to the UK without medical insurance and make use of the NHS before returning to their home country without paying for their treatment.
